Bash.description:
During a save roll, target one unit in the attacking army. The target takes four points of damage.
* During other rolls, Bash generates four results of the appropriate type.
Bash.name: Bash

Belly_Front.description: The dragon's five automatic saves do not count during this attack. In other words, five points of damage will slay the dragon this turn.
Belly_Front.name: Belly_Front

Belly_Rear.description: The dragon's five automatic saves do not count during this attack. In other words, five points of damage will slay the dragon this turn.
Belly_Rear.name: Belly_Rear

Bite.description:
During a melee attack, target one unit in the defending army. The target makes a save roll. If the target does not generate a save result, it is killed.
* During a save roll, Bite generates four save results.
* During a dragon attack, Bite generates four melee and four save results.
Bite.name: Bite

Bullseye.description:
During a missile attack, Bullseye inflicts four points of damage to the defending army with no save possible.
* During a maneuver roll, Bullseye generates four maneuver results.
* During a dragon attack, Bullseye generates four missile results.
Bullseye.name: Bullseye

Cantrip_3.description: During any roll, Cantrip generates three magic results. During a magic action, you may cast any cantrip spell for free.
Cantrip_3.name: Cantrip_3

Cantrip_4.description: During any roll, Cantrip generates four magic results. During a magic action, you may cast any cantrip spell for free.
Cantrip_4.name: Cantrip_4

Charge.description:
During a melee attack, the attacking army counts all Maneuver results as if they were Melee results.
* Instead of making a regular save roll or a counter-attack, the defending army makes a combination save and melee roll.
* The attacking army takes damage equal to these melee results. Only save results generated by spells may reduce this damage.
* Charge has no effect during a counter-attack.
Charge.name: Charge

Charm.description:
During a melee attack, target up to four health-worth of units in the defending army. The targets join your army until the end of the turn.
* During a save roll, Charm generates four save results.
* During a dragon attack, Charm generates four melee and four save results.
Charm.name: Charm

Choke.description: During a melee attack, when the defending army rolls for saves, target up to four health-worth of units in the that army that rolled an ID result. The target units are killed. Their ID results are not counted towards the army's save results. Note: Choke works outside of the normal sequence of die roll resolution, applying it's effect immediately after the opponent's roll for saves is made, but before they resolve any SAIs
Choke.name: Choke

Claw_Front_Left.description: A dragon's claws inflict six points of damage on an army.
Claw_Front_Left.name: Claw_Front_Left

Claw_Front_Right.description: A dragon's claws inflict six points of damage on an army.
Claw_Front_Right.name: Claw_Front_Right

Claw_Rear_Left.description: A dragon's claws inflict six points of damage on an army.
Claw_Rear_Left.name: Claw_Rear_Left

Claw_Rear_Right.description: A dragon's claws inflict six points of damage on an army.
Claw_Rear_Right.name: Claw_Rear_Right

Cloak.description:
During any roll, Cloak generates four save results. This unit cannot be targeted by spells or special abilities until the end of the turn.
* During a save roll, Cloak generates four additional save results.
Cloak.name: Cloak

Coil.description:
During a melee attack, target one unit in the defending army. The target takes four points of damage.
* During a save roll, Coil generates four save results.
* During a dragon attack, Coil generates four melee and four save results.
Coil.name: Coil

Confuse.description:
During a melee attack, target up to four health-worth of units in the defending army. The targets attack their own army instead.
* During a save roll, Confuse generates four save results.
* During a dragon attack, Confuse generates four melee and four save results.
Confuse.name: Confuse

Convert.description:
During a melee attack, target up to three health-worth of units in the defending army. The targets make a save roll. Those that do not generate a save result are killed.
* The attacking player may return up to the amount of heath-worth killed this way from their DUA to the attacking army.
Convert.name: Convert

Counter.description:
During a save roll, Counter generates four save results. If this unit survives the attack, it immediately makes a counter-attack against the attacking army.
* During other rolls, Counter generates four results of the appropriate type.
Counter.name: Counter

Counter (scorching).description: During a save roll, Counter (scorching) generates four save results. If this unit survives the attack, it immediately makes a counter-attack against the attacking army with scorching effects.
Counter (scorching).name: Counter (scorching)

Create Fireminions.description: During any army roll, Create Fireminions generates four magic, maneuver, melee, missile or save results.
Create Fireminions.name: Create Fireminions

Dispel Magic.description:
Whenever any magic targets this unit, the army containing this unit and/or the terrain this unit occupies, you may roll this unit after all spells are announced but before any are resolved.
* If the Dispel Magic icon is rolled, negate all unresolved magic that targets or effects this unit, its army or the terrain it occupies. Magic targeting other units, armies, or terrains is unaffected by this SAI.
Dispel Magic.name: Dispel Magic

Double Strike.description:
During a melee attack, target four health-worth of units in the defending army. The targets make a save roll. Those that do not generate a save result are killed. Roll this unit again and apply the new result as well.
* During a dragon attack, Double Strike generates four melee results.
Double Strike.name: Double Strike

Dragon_Breath.description:
Against another dragon, dragon breath inflicts five (ten for a White Dragon) points of damage; roll the dragon again and apply the new result as well.
* Against armies, five health-worth of units in the target army are killed.
* In addition, an effect based on the color affects the army:
** BLACK (Dragon Plague): The army ignores all of its ID results until the beginning of its next turn.
** BLUE (Lightning Bolt): The army's melee results are halved until the beginning of its next turn. Results are rounded down.
** YELLOW (Petrify): The army's maneuver results are halved until the beginning of its next turn. Results are rounded down.
** GREEN (Poisonous Cloud): The army's missile results are halved until the beginning of its next turn. Results are rounded down.
** RED (Dragon Fire): Roll the units killed by this dragon's breath attack. Those that do not generate a save result are buried.
** IVORY (Life Drain): No additional effect.
** WHITE (Terrain Empathy): An additional five health-worth of units in the army are killed. The army is affected by a breath of both colors of the terrain.
Dragon_Breath.name: Dragon_Breath

Entangle.description: During a melee attack, target up to two health-worth of units in the defending army. The targets are killed and buried.
Entangle.name: Entangle

Ferry.description:
During any roll, move up to two health-worth of units from this army to any other terrain where you have an army.
* During a maneuver roll, Ferry generates four maneuver results.
* During other rolls, Ferry generates four results of the appropriate type.
Ferry.name: Ferry

Firebreath.description: During a melee attack, target up to four health-worth of units in the defending army. The targets are killed and buried.
Firebreath.name: Firebreath

Firecloud.description: During a melee or missile attack, target up to four health-worth of units in the defending army. The targets make a maneuver roll. Those that do not generate a maneuver result are killed.
Firecloud.name: Firecloud

Firewalking.description:
During any roll, move this unit to any terrain containing fire where you have an army.
* During a maneuver roll, Firewalking generates four maneuver results.
* During other rolls, Firewalking generates four results of the appropriate type.
Firewalking.name: Firewalking

Flame.description: During a melee attack, target up to two health-worth of units in the defending army. The targets are killed and buried.
Flame.name: Flame

Flaming Arrow.description:
During a missile attack, target four health-worth of units in the defending army. The targets make a save roll. Those that do not generate a save result are killed.
* Each unit killed must make another save roll. Those that do not generate a save result on this second roll are buried.
* During a dragon attack, Flaming Arrow generates four missile results.
Flaming Arrow.name: Flaming Arrow

Flaming_Shield_1.description: During any roll, Flaming Shield generates one save result. During a save roll against a melee attack, Flaming Shield inflicts one point of damage on the attacking army.
Flaming_Shield_1.name: Flaming_Shield_1

Flaming_Shield_2.description: During any roll, Flaming Shield generates two save results. During a save roll against a melee attack, Flaming Shield inflicts two points of damage on the attacking army.
Flaming_Shield_2.name: Flaming_Shield_2

Flaming_Shield_3.description: During any roll, Flaming Shield generates three save results. During a save roll against a melee attack, Flaming Shield inflicts three points of damage on the attacking army.
Flaming_Shield_3.name: Flaming_Shield_3

Flaming_Shield_4.description: During any roll, Flaming Shield generates four save results. During a save roll against a melee attack, Flaming Shield inflicts four points of damage on the attacking army.
Flaming_Shield_4.name: Flaming_Shield_4

Fly_1.description: During any roll, Fly generates one maneuver or one save result.
Fly_1.name: Fly_1

Fly_2.description: During any roll, Fly generates two maneuver or two save results.
Fly_2.name: Fly_2

Fly_3.description: During any roll, Fly generates three maneuver or three save results.
Fly_3.name: Fly_3

Fly_4.description: During any roll, Fly generates four maneuver or four save results.
Fly_4.name: Fly_4

Fly_5.description: During any roll, Fly generates five maneuver or five save results.
Fly_5.name: Fly_5

Frost Breath.description: During a melee or missile attack, target an opposing army at the same terrain. Until the beginning of your next turn, the target army halves all results they roll.
Frost Breath.name: Frost Breath

Frost Cantrip.description:
During a magic action or magic negation roll, Cantrip generates four magic results.
* During other non-maneuver rolls, Cantrip generates four magic results that allow you to cast spells marked as 'Cantrip' from the spell list.
* During a magic negation roll, Cantrip generates four anti-magic results.
Frost Cantrip.name: Frost Cantrip

Frost_Breath.description:
During a melee attack, target up to four health-worth of units in the defending army. The targets make a save roll. Those that do not generate a save result are killed.
* During a save roll, Frost Breath generates four save results.
* During a dragon attack, Frost Breath generates four melee and four save results.
Frost_Breath.name: Frost_Breath

Frost_Magic_1.description: During any roll, Frost Magic generates one magic result. During a magic action, Frost Magic may count as one magic result used to negate an opposing magic action instead of contributing to the spell casting cost.
Frost_Magic_1.name: Frost_Magic_1

Frost_Magic_2.description: During any roll, Frost Magic generates two magic results. During a magic action, Frost Magic may count as two magic results used to negate an opposing magic action instead of contributing to the spell casting cost.
Frost_Magic_2.name: Frost_Magic_2

Frost_Magic_3.description: During any roll, Frost Magic generates three magic results. During a magic action, Frost Magic may count as three magic results used to negate an opposing magic action instead of contributing to the spell casting cost.
Frost_Magic_3.name: Frost_Magic_3

Frost_Magic_4.description: During any roll, Frost Magic generates four magic results. During a magic action, Frost Magic may count as four magic results used to negate an opposing magic action instead of contributing to the spell casting cost.
Frost_Magic_4.name: Frost_Magic_4

Galeforce.description:
During a melee attack, target up to four health-worth of units in the defending army. The targets are moved to their Reserve Area.
* During a save roll, Galeforce generates four save results.
* During a dragon attack, Galeforce generates four melee and four save results.
Galeforce.name: Galeforce

Gore.description:
During a melee attack, target one unit in the defending army. The target takes four points of damage.
* During a save roll, Gore generates four save results.
* During a dragon attack, Gore generates four melee and four save results.
Gore.name: Gore

Hoof_1.description: During any roll, Hoof generates one maneuver result.
Hoof_1.name: Hoof_1

Hoof_2.description: During any roll, Hoof generates two maneuver results.
Hoof_2.name: Hoof_2

Hoof_3.description: During any roll, Hoof generates three maneuver results.
Hoof_3.name: Hoof_3

Hoof_4.description: During any roll, Hoof generates four maneuver results.
Hoof_4.name: Hoof_4

Howl.description:
During a melee attack, target up to four health-worth of units in the defending army. The targets flee to their Reserve Area.
* During a save roll, Howl generates four save results.
* During a dragon attack, Howl generates four melee and four save results.
Howl.name: Howl

Hug.description:
During a melee attack, target one unit in the defending army. The target takes four points of damage.
* During a save roll, Hug generates four save results.
* During a dragon attack, Hug generates four melee and four save results.
Hug.name: Hug

Hypnotic Glare.description:
During a melee attack, when the defending army rolls for saves, all units that roll an ID result are Hypnotized and may not be rolled until the beginning of your next turn. Those ID results are not counted as saves.
* The effect ends if the glaring unit leaves the terrain, is killed, or is rolled. The glaring unit may be excluded from any roll until the effect expires.
Note: Hypnotic Glare works outside of the normal sequence of die roll resolution, applying it's effect immediately after the opponent's roll for saves is made, but before they resolve any SAIs
Hypnotic Glare.name: Hypnotic Glare

ID_1.description: Counts as 1 point of whatever the owning army is rolling for.
ID_1.name: ID_1

ID_2.description: Counts as 2 points of whatever the owning army is rolling for.
ID_2.name: ID_2

ID_3.description: Counts as 3 points of whatever the owning army is rolling for.
ID_3.name: ID_3

ID_4.description: Counts as 4 points of whatever the owning army is rolling for.
ID_4.name: ID_4

Illusion.description: During a magic, melee or missile attack, target any of your armies. Until the beginning of your next turn, the target army cannot be targeted by any missile attacks or spells cast by opposing players.
Illusion.name: Illusion

Jaws.description: A dragon's jaws inflict twelve points of damage on an army. Also counts as the 'ID' for ID based SAIs that effect Dragons.
Jaws.name: Jaws

Kick.description:
During a melee attack, target one unit in the defending army. The target takes four points of damage.
* During a save roll, Kick generates four save results.
* During a dragon attack, Kick generates four melee and four save results.
Kick.name: Kick

Net.description:
During a melee attack, target up to four health-worth of units in the defending army. The targets are entangled and cannot move.
* During a save roll, Net generates four save results.
* During a dragon attack, Net generates four melee and four save results.
Net.name: Net

Paw.description: During any roll, Paw generates six maneuver results.
Paw.name: Paw

Paw_1.description: During any roll, Paw generates one maneuver result.
Paw_1.name: Paw_1

Paw_2.description: During any roll, Paw generates two maneuver results.
Paw_2.name: Paw_2

Paw_3.description: During any roll, Paw generates three maneuver results.
Paw_3.name: Paw_3

Paw_4.description: During any roll, Paw generates four maneuver results.
Paw_4.name: Paw_4

Plague.description:
During a melee attack, target one unit in the defending army. The target makes a save roll. If the target does not generate a save result, it is killed.
* During a save roll, Plague generates four save results.
* During a dragon attack, Plague generates four melee and four save results.
Plague.name: Plague

Poison.description: During a melee attack, target one unit in the defending army. The target is killed and buried.
Poison.name: Poison

Portal.description:
During any roll, move any army from your Reserve Area to this terrain.
* During a maneuver roll, Portal generates four maneuver results.
* During other rolls, Portal generates four results of the appropriate type.
Portal.name: Portal

Regenerate.description:
During a save roll, this unit heals one point of damage if it has taken any.
* During other rolls, Regenerate generates four save results.
Regenerate.name: Regenerate

Rend_3.description:
During a melee or dragon attack, Rend generates three melee results. Roll this unit again and apply the new result as well.
* During a maneuver roll, Rend generates three maneuver results.
Rend_3.name: Rend_3

Rend_4.description:
During a melee or dragon attack, Rend generates four melee results. Roll this unit again and apply the new result as well.
* During a maneuver roll, Rend generates four maneuver results.
Rend_4.name: Rend_4

Rise From Ashes.description: During a save roll, Rise from the Ashes generates four save results. Whenever a unit with this SAI is killed or buried, roll the unit. If Rise from the Ashes is rolled, the unit is moved to your Reserve Area. If an effect both kills and buries this unit, it may roll once when killed and again when buried. If the first roll is successful, the unit is not buried.
Rise From Ashes.name: Rise From Ashes

Roar.description: During a melee attack, target up to four health-worth of units in the defending army. The targets are immediately moved to their Reserve Area before the defending army rolls for saves.
Roar.name: Roar

Scare.description:
During a melee attack, target up to three health-worth of units in the defending army. The targets make a save roll.
* Those that do not generate a save result are immediately moved to their Reserve Area before the defending army rolls for saves. Those that roll their ID icon are killed.
Scare.name: Scare

Scorching Wings.description:
During any roll, Fly generates four maneuver or four save results.
* When at a terrain that contains red (fire), Scalders making a save roll against a melee action inflict four points of damage on the attacking army.
* Only save results generated by spells may reduce this damage. Scorching Touch does not apply when saving against a counter-attack.
Scorching Wings.name: Scorching Wings

Scorching_Shield_1.description: During any roll, Scorching Shield generates one save result. During a save roll against a melee attack, Scorching Shield inflicts one point of damage on the attacking army with no save possible.
Scorching_Shield_1.name: Scorching_Shield_1

Scorching_Shield_2.description: During any roll, Scorching Shield generates two save results. During a save roll against a melee attack, Scorching Shield inflicts two points of damage on the attacking army with no save possible.
Scorching_Shield_2.name: Scorching_Shield_2

Scorching_Shield_4.description: During any roll, Scorching Shield generates four save results. During a save roll against a melee attack, Scorching Shield inflicts four points of damage on the attacking army with no save possible.
Scorching_Shield_4.name: Scorching_Shield_4

Screech.description:
During a melee attack, target up to four health-worth of units in the defending army. The targets are stunned.
* During a save roll, Screech generates four save results.
* During a dragon attack, Screech generates four melee and four save results.
Screech.name: Screech

Seize.description: During a melee or missile attack, target up to four health-worth of units in the defending army. Roll the targets. If they roll an ID result, they are immediately moved to their Reserve Area. Any that do not roll an ID are killed.
Seize.name: Seize

Slay.description:
During a melee attack, target one unit in the defending army. The target is killed and buried.
* During a save roll, Slay generates four save results.
* During a dragon attack, Slay generates four melee and four save results.
Slay.name: Slay

Sleep.description:
During a melee attack, target up to four health-worth of units in the defending army. The targets cannot participate in counter-attacks until the end of the turn.
* During a save roll, Sleep generates four save results.
* During a dragon attack, Sleep generates four melee and four save results.
Sleep.name: Sleep

Smite_3.description:
During a melee attack, Smite inflicts three points of damage to the defending army with no save possible.
* During a dragon attack, Smite generates three melee results.
Smite_3.name: Smite_3

Smite_4.description:
During a melee attack, Smite inflicts four points of damage to the defending army with no save possible.
* During a dragon attack, Smite generates four melee results.
Smite_4.name: Smite_4

Smother.description: During a melee attack, target up to four health-worth of units in the defending army. The targets make a maneuver roll. Those that do not generate a maneuver result are killed.
Smother.name: Smother

Sting.description:
During a melee attack, target one unit in the defending army. The target makes a save roll. If the target does not generate a save result, it is killed.
* During a save roll, Sting generates four save results.
* During a dragon attack, Sting generates four melee and four save results.
Sting.name: Sting

Stomp.description:
During a melee attack, target up to four health-worth of units in the defending army. The targets make a maneuver roll. Those that do not generate a maneuver result are killed and must make a save roll. Those that do not generate a save result are buried.
* During a dragon attack, Stomp generates four melee results.
Stomp.name: Stomp

Stone.description:
During a melee attack, target up to four health-worth of units in the defending army. The targets are turned to stone and cannot act.
* During a save roll, Stone generates four save results.
* During a dragon attack, Stone generates four melee and four save results.
Stone.name: Stone

Stun.description:
During a melee attack, target up to four health-worth of units in the defending army. The targets cannot perform any actions until the end of the turn.
* During a save roll, Stun generates four save results.
* During a dragon attack, Stun generates four melee and four save results.
Stun.name: Stun

Surprise.description: During a melee attack, the defending army cannot counter-attack. The defending army may still make a save roll as normal. Surprise has no effect during a counter-attack.
Surprise.name: Surprise

Swallow.description:
During a melee attack, target one unit in the defending army. The target is killed and buried.
* During a save roll, Swallow generates four save results.
* During a dragon attack, Swallow generates four melee and four save results.
Swallow.name: Swallow

Tail.description: During a dragon or melee attack, Tail generates two melee results. Roll this unit again and apply the new result as well.
Tail.name: Tail

Tail_Front.description: The dragon's tail inflicts three points of damage on an army; roll the dragon again and apply the new results as well.
Tail_Front.name: Tail_Front

Tail_Middle.description: The dragon's tail inflicts three points of damage on an army; roll the dragon again and apply the new results as well.
Tail_Middle.name: Tail_Middle

Tail_Tip.description: The dragon's tail inflicts three points of damage on an army; roll the dragon again and apply the new results as well.
Tail_Tip.name: Tail_Tip

Teleport.description:
During any roll, move this unit to any other terrain where you have an army.
* During a maneuver roll, Teleport generates four maneuver results.
* During other rolls, Teleport generates four results of the appropriate type.
Teleport.name: Teleport

Trample_3.description: During any roll, Trample generates three maneuver and three melee results.
Trample_3.name: Trample_3

Trample_4.description: During any roll, Trample generates four maneuver and four melee results.
Trample_4.name: Trample_4

Treasure.description: One unit in the target army may immediately be promoted.
Treasure.name: Treasure

Trumpet.description: During a dragon attack, melee attack or save roll, each Feral unit in this army doubles its melee and save results.
Trumpet.name: Trumpet

Vanish.description:
During any roll, move this unit to your Reserve Area.
* During a maneuver roll, Vanish generates four maneuver results.
* During other rolls, Vanish generates four results of the appropriate type.
Vanish.name: Vanish

Volley.description:
During a save roll against a melee attack, make a missile attack against the attacking army using this unit's missile results.
* During other rolls, Volley generates four missile results.
Volley.name: Volley

Wave.description:
During a melee attack, target up to four health-worth of units in the defending army. The targets are pushed back.
* During a save roll, Wave generates four save results.
* During a dragon attack, Wave generates four melee and four save results.
Wave.name: Wave

Web.description:
During a melee attack, target up to two health-worth of units in the defending army. The targets are trapped and cannot act.
* During a save roll, Web generates four save results.
* During a dragon attack, Web generates four melee and four save results.
Web.name: Web

Wild Growth.description: During any non-maneuver roll, Wild Growth generates four save results or allows you to promote four health-worth of units in this army. Results may be split between saves and promotions in any way you choose. Any promotions happen all at once.
Wild Growth.name: Wild Growth

Wing_Left.description: A dragon's wings inflict five points of damage on an army. After the attack, if the dragon is still alive, it flies away. It returns to it's summoning pool.
Wing_Left.name: Wing_Left

Wing_Right.description: A dragon's wings inflict five points of damage on an army. After the attack, if the dragon is still alive, it flies away. It returns to it's summoning pool.
Wing_Right.name: Wing_Right

Wither.description: During a melee attack, target any opposing army at the same terrain. Until the beginning of your next turn, the targeted army subtracts three results from all rolls it makes.
Wither.name: Wither
